meanings.sent1: The misshapen pumpkin looked lopsided and uneven.
meanings.sent2: The misshapen tree had branches that twisted in strange ways.
meanings.sent3: The misshapen cookie was so uneven that it made the kids giggle.
meanings.sent4: Her misshapen shadow on the wall looked like a distorted figure.
meanings.sent5: The misshapen rock stood out among the smooth pebbles on the beach.

meanings.definition: Not having the correct or normal shape
meanings.sent1: The misshapen puzzle piece didn't fit into the picture.
meanings.sent2: His misshapen hat kept slipping off his head.
meanings.sent3: The misshapen balloon wobbled in the air, looking funny.
meanings.sent4: The misshapen road sign led us in the wrong direction.
meanings.sent5: The misshapen key couldn't unlock the rusty old lock.
